biotools.summary: CuBlock is a cross-platform gene expression microarrays normalization method. Microarrays from one platform can be normalized together. This method is useful when a study includes the analysis of microarrays originating from multiple platforms and standard normalization methods don't apply to reduce the inter-platform batch effect.

bioschemas.name: CuBlock
